Forecast Task

Source: R/TaskForecast.R
TaskForecast.Rd

This task specializes Task and TaskSupervised for forecasting problems. The target column is assumed to be numeric. The task_type is set to "forecast" `.

Format

R6::R6Class object inheriting from Task/TaskSupervised.

Construction

t = TaskRegrForecast$new(id, backend, target, date_col)

  • id :: character(1)
    Identifier for the task.

  • backend :: DataBackend
    Either a DataBackendLong, a object of class ts or a data.frame with specified date column or any object which is convertible to a DataBackend with as_data_backend(). E.g., a object of class dts will be converted to a DataBackendLong.

  • target :: character(n)
    Name of the target column(s).

Fields

All methods from TaskSupervised, and additionally:

  • date_col :: character(1)
    Name of the date column.

Methods

See TaskSupervised, additionally:

  • date(row_ids = NULL) :: data.table
    (integer() | character()) -> named list()
    Returns the date column.

See also

seealso_task

Other Task: TaskRegrForecast
